name: GTIN-Validation
tagline: Validate GTIN-8, GTIN-12, GTIN-13, and GTIN-14s in different languages (Go, JavaScript, and PHP)
body:
## Determine validity of GTINs via the Check Digit
This function checks the validity of GTIN-8, GTIN-12, GTIN-13, and GTIN-14 barcodes.

A number of classes/functions have been written in different languages, such as Javascript and PHP - the supported list :-

### Languages Supported
    Javascript, PHP
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
